org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source

Class TextDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source.AbstractDataSource
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source.TextDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource, Specifiable

    public class TextDataSource
extends AbstractDataSource
    Data source backed by a CSV file. Use CSVDataSourceBuilder to configure and build one of these, or the csvfile command in an eval script.
    Since:
    2.2
    See Also:
    CSVDataSourceBuilder

        Default item DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements ItemDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingItemDAO is created.
        Specified by:

      • getItemNameDAO

        public ItemNameDAO getItemNameDAO()
        Description copied from class: AbstractDataSource
        Get the item name DAO. The default implementation first checks if the event DAO implements this interface, then the item DAO.
        Specified by:
        getItemNameDAO in interface DataSource
        Overrides:

        Returns:

      • toSpecification

        @Nonnull
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> toSpecification(SpecificationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Specifiable
        Create a specification for this object. The return value should be a JSON-like structure, such that wrapping it in ConfigFactory.parseMap(java.util.Map) and passing it to SpecificationContext.build(Class, com.typesafe.config.Config) will result in an equivalent object.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for generating the specification.
        Returns:
        A specification for this object.
